Game.Name: Final Soldier (Japan)
Game.plot: Overview:Final Soldier is the third game in the Star Soldier series and the second of the core games to be released on the PC Engine platform. It sits between Super Star Soldier and Soldier Blade. Unlike those two games, Final Soldier was never released on the US TurboGrafx-16, but eventually saw an international release in 2007 when it was added to the Wii's Virtual Console in all territories. It has also since been added to the Wii U eShop as well.Among the Star Soldier games, Final Soldier is well-regarded for its weapon customization, allowing players to choose from up to twelve weapon configurations. It also doesn't require that the player restart the stage if they lose a life, unlike other Star Soldiers.Cheat: Arcade Screen ModeAt the title screen, highlight "Normal" mode and press Left, Left, I, Right, Right, II, Up, Down, Up, Down, Left, Left, I, Right, Right, II, Up, Down, Up, Down. If done right you should hear a sound. Now start the game and then hold Run and press Select to reset the game. The game will now start in the Arcade Screen mode.Cheat: Arcade Screen ModeAt the title screen, highlight "Score" and press Left, Left, I, Right, Right, II, Up, Down, Up, Down. If done right you should hear a sound and all the scores will reset back to zero.Cheat: Arcade Screen ModeAt the title screen, press Select until "Set Up" is highlighted. Now press Left, Left, Button 1, Right, Right, Button 2, Up, Down, Up, Down.
